Uses of Package
ddf.catalog.federation

  • Packages that use ddf.catalog.federation 
    Package Description
    ddf.catalog
    Provides the classes for the Catalog Framework API and implementation.
    ddf.catalog.cache.solr.impl  
    ddf.catalog.event
    Provides the classes for the Catalog Event API and implementation.
    ddf.catalog.event.impl
    Provides the classes for the Catalog Event API reference implementation.
    ddf.catalog.federation
    Provides the classes for the Catalog Federation API and implementation.
    ddf.catalog.federation.base

    Provides the Catalog Framework reference implementation.

    Provides the classes for the Catalog Operation API and implementation.

    Provides the classes for the Catalog Operation API and implementation.

  • Classes in ddf.catalog.federation used by ddf.catalog 
    Class and Description
    FederationException
    This exception should be thrown when general federation issues arise.
    FederationStrategy
    Implementations of this interface federate the specified query to all the Sources in the list, process the Results in a unique way, and then return the results to the client.
  • Classes in ddf.catalog.federation used by ddf.catalog.cache.solr.impl

    Interface describing an object that can be federated with other Sources
